lead_paragraph: Newcastle United's official fans' forum has written an open letter to the relegation-threatened club's board calling for "action and accountability" over the team's perilous position in the Premier League.

headline.print_headline: Newcastle Fans Condemn McClaren and Team in Open Letter
headline.main: Newcastle Fans Condemn McClaren and Team in Open Letter
